paragraphs: Residents of Prague will be able to hear their favorite songs of the iconic rock band "Kino" accompanied by a symphony orchestra. The tribute concert "A Star Called Sun" will take place on December 4th on the stage of the Hybernia theater in the very center of the city.
👉 Tickets can be purchased through this link.
The concert will feature a full rock band (two vocalists, two backing vocalists, two guitarists, bass, drums) and musicians from the Czech Live Symphony Orchestra.

"The guests will hear a combination of rock music and classical instruments. The recreation of authentic sound and arrangements of the concert versions of "KINO" will give the audience the opportunity to hear live performances of their favorite songs."

Legendary songs of the wonderful musician, poet, artist, actor, and idol of several generations, Viktor Tsoi! You will experience an atmosphere of change that will help you once again feel the spirit of true freedom," the event description says.
This concert is the perfect gift for all generations: both for those who grew up on the songs of the band, and for those who are just beginning to discover the magic of Viktor Tsoi's legacy.
🎫 Tickets: are being sold at this link.
